root.name: Ray's the Dead
root.description: Ray's the Dead is an action-strategy-puzzler where you grow and control a massive zombie army! Releasing in the second half of 2013 for the PC.System RequirementsPC OS:Windows XPProcessor:2 GHz Dual CoreMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT or greaterDirectX:Version 9.0Hard Drive:2 GB available spaceSound Card:DirectX CompatibleMac OS:OSX 10.6Processor:2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core)Memory:2 GB RAMHard Drive:2 GB available spaceLinux OS:Ubuntu Linux 10.10Processor:2.0 GHzMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:GeForce 8800 or RadeonÂ® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memoryHard Drive:2 GB available space
